name: Spark Together
description:
This game was made for Lost Relic Games - GAME JAM

It's our first game, we are 3 computer engineers with very few knowledge about assets creation, but everything you will see was created by us.

We are:

  • Blazez404
  • Jok011
  • Freuk

The game is about two little sparks, and the objective is trying to connect them (to meet each spark) by connecting them in inputs to solve the puzzles.
